content.p: Rowan and Collen each put ${{pool}} into the pot. Then 4 Jacks, 4 Queens and 4 Kings are shuffled, and then one card each is dealt to Rowan and Colleen. They may each see their own card but not their opponents. Rowan may either Fold, in which case Colleen takes the entire pot, or they may Raise by ${{bet}}, putting this value into the pot. If Rowan raises, then either Colleen Folds, in which case Rowan takes the pot, or Calls, also placing ${{bet}} into the pot. If Colleen calls, both player reveals their cards, and the player with the higher card (with Jack < Queen < King) takes the pot. In the case of a tie they split the pot.
Write out the payoff matrix for this game.

Rowan may either Fold, in which case Colleen takes the entire pot, or they may Raise by ${{bet}}, putting this value into the pot. If Rowan raises, then either Colleen Folds, in which case Rowan takes the pot, or Calls, also placing ${{bet}} into the pot. If Colleen calls, both player reveals their coins, and the player with the higher number of heads takes the pot. In the case of a tie they split the pot.
Write out the payoff matrix for this game.
